languages.text: "И по велению Императора обманом я занял место Адальберта, выдал себя за него. Покойник унаследовал от клана немало влияния и тронов, даровавших мне успешный рост в чинах. Но не ради достатка и власти я совершил это — я принял бремя тяжкого служения, чтобы помочь простым людям. Подготовить почву для освобождения от угнетения и несправедливости. И моя роль почти сыграна".

"And it was by the Emperor's command that I took Adalbert's place through deception, pretending to be him. The dead man had inherited much influence and many thrones from his clan, which hastened my successful rise through the ranks. But it was not for wealth and power that I did this! I accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people, to pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."
languages.original_text: "И по велению Императора обманом я занял место Адальберта, выдал себя за него. Покойник унаследовал от клана немало влияния и тронов, даровавших мне успешный рост в чинах. Но не ради достатка и власти я совершил это — я принял бремя тяжкого служения, чтобы помочь простым людям. Подготовить почву для освобождения от угнетения и несправедливости. И моя роль почти сыграна".

traits.locale_text: "And it was by his command that I took Adalbert's place by deception, pretending to be him. The dead man had inherited much influence and many thrones from his clan, which hastened my successful rise through the ranks. But it was not for wealth and power that I have done this! I have accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people. To pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."

I have accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people. To pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."

I accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people, to pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."

I accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people, to pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."

languages.text: "Und auf Befehl des Imperators nahm ich durch Täuschung Adalberts Platz ein, ich gab vor, er zu sein. Der Tote hatte von seinem Clan viel Einfluss und viele Thronmünzen geerbt, was meinen erfolgreichen Aufstieg durch die Ränge beschleunigte. Aber es ging mir dabei nicht um Wohlstand und Macht! Ich akzeptierte die Bürde harter Arbeit, um das gemeine Volk zu stärken, um den Weg zu bereiten für die Befreiung von Unterdrückung und Ungerechtigkeit. Und mein Anteil daran ist fast beendet."
languages.original_text: "And it was by the Emperor's command that I took Adalbert's place through deception, pretending to be him. The dead man had inherited much influence and many thrones from his clan, which hastened my successful rise through the ranks. But it was not for wealth and power that I did this! I accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people, to pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."

traits.locale_text: "Und auf Befehl des Imperators nahm ich durch Täuschung Adalberts Platz ein, ich gab vor, er zu sein. Der Tote hatte von seinem Clan viel Einfluss und viele Thronmünzen geerbt, was meinen erfolgreichen Aufstieg durch die Ränge beschleunigte. Aber es ging mir dabei nicht um Wohlstand und Macht! Ich akzeptierte die Bürde harter Arbeit, um das gemeine Volk zu stärken, um den Weg zu bereiten für die Befreiung von Unterdrückung und Ungerechtigkeit. Und mein Anteil daran ist fast beendet."

languages.text: «Y fue por orden del Emperador que ocupé el lugar de Adalbert mediante engaños, haciéndome pasar por él. El difunto había heredado de su clan una gran influencia y una fortuna en tronos, y ambas cosas me procuraron un ascenso meteórico por las filas del clero. ¡Mas no fue por riqueza ni poder! Acepté la carga de un trabajo sacrificado para ayudar al pueblo llano, para despejar el camino hacia la liberación de la opresión y la injusticia. Y mi labor casi ha concluido».
languages.original_text: "And it was by the Emperor's command that I took Adalbert's place through deception, pretending to be him. The dead man had inherited much influence and many thrones from his clan, which hastened my successful rise through the ranks. But it was not for wealth and power that I did this! I accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people, to pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."

traits.locale_text: «Y fue por orden del Emperador que ocupé el lugar de Adalbert mediante engaños, haciéndome pasar por él. El difunto había heredado de su clan una gran influencia y una fortuna en tronos, y ambas cosas me procuraron un ascenso meteórico por las filas del clero. ¡Mas no fue por riqueza ni poder! Acepté la carga de un trabajo sacrificado para ayudar al pueblo llano, para despejar el camino hacia la liberación de la opresión y la injusticia. Y mi labor casi ha concluido».

languages.text: 「皇帝の命令で、私はアダルバートになりすまし、アダルバートとして生きた。死んだアダルバートは、一族から多大な影響力と多くの王座を受け継いでいたよ。しかし、私がこのようなことをしたのは富や権力のためではない！平民に力を与え、抑圧と不公平から解放する道を開くために、私は苦役を引き受けたのだ。そして、私の役目はほとんど終わった」
languages.original_text: "And it was by the Emperor's command that I took Adalbert's place through deception, pretending to be him. The dead man had inherited much influence and many thrones from his clan, which hastened my successful rise through the ranks. But it was not for wealth and power that I did this! I accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people, to pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の命令で、私はアダルバートになりすまし、アダルバートとして生きた。死んだアダルバートは、一族から多大な影響力と多くの王座を受け継いでいたよ。しかし、私がこのようなことをしたのは富や権力のためではない！平民に力を与え、抑圧と不公平から解放する道を開くために、私は苦役を引き受けたのだ。そして、私の役目はほとんど終わった」

languages.text: “根据帝皇的意志，我通过欺瞒的手段取代了阿达伯特的位置，冒用了他的身份。这个人从他的氏族中继承了大笔财产，拥有强大的影响力，我也因此很快跻身高层。然而，我这么做并不是为了财富或权力！帝皇赐予了我重任，让我引导普通民众踏上自由之路。祂让我铺平抗争的道路，让受到压迫的普通人得到解放，而我的任务已经差不多完成了。”
languages.original_text: "And it was by the Emperor's command that I took Adalbert's place through deception, pretending to be him. The dead man had inherited much influence and many thrones from his clan, which hastened my successful rise through the ranks. But it was not for wealth and power that I did this! I accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people, to pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."

traits.locale_text: “根据帝皇的意志，我通过欺瞒的手段取代了阿达伯特的位置，冒用了他的身份。这个人从他的氏族中继承了大笔财产，拥有强大的影响力，我也因此很快跻身高层。然而，我这么做并不是为了财富或权力！帝皇赐予了我重任，让我引导普通民众踏上自由之路。祂让我铺平抗争的道路，让受到压迫的普通人得到解放，而我的任务已经差不多完成了。”

languages.text: « Et c'est sur ordre de l'Empereur que je me suis fait passer pour Adalbert afin de prendre sa place. Le défunt avait hérité de son clan une petite fortune et une grande influence, ce qui a considérablement accéléré mon ascension dans la hiérarchie. Mais si j'ai agi ainsi, ce n'est ni pour l'argent ni pour le pouvoir ! J'ai œuvré sans relâche pour l'émancipation du peuple, pour paver la voie de la libération face à l'oppression et l'injustice. Et ma mission est presque terminée. »
languages.original_text: "And it was by the Emperor's command that I took Adalbert's place through deception, pretending to be him. The dead man had inherited much influence and many thrones from his clan, which hastened my successful rise through the ranks. But it was not for wealth and power that I did this! I accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people, to pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."

traits.locale_text: « Et c'est sur ordre de l'Empereur que je me suis fait passer pour Adalbert afin de prendre sa place. Le défunt avait hérité de son clan une petite fortune et une grande influence, ce qui a considérablement accéléré mon ascension dans la hiérarchie. Mais si j'ai agi ainsi, ce n'est ni pour l'argent ni pour le pouvoir ! J'ai œuvré sans relâche pour l'émancipation du peuple, pour paver la voie de la libération face à l'oppression et l'injustice. Et ma mission est presque terminée. »

languages.text: "Ve İmparator'un emriyle aldatmacalara başvurarak Adalbert'in yerini aldım, oymuş gibi yaptım. Ölü adama klanından büyük bir nüfuz ve bol miktarda gelt miras kalmıştı, bu da beni başarıya ulaştırdı, hızla rütbe atlamamı sağladı. Ama ben bunu zenginlik veya güç için yapmadım! Sıkı çalışmanın yükünü sırtlamamın sebebi sıradan insanları güçlendirmek, baskı ve adaletsizlikten özgürlüğe giden yolu açmaktı. Ve görevimi tamamlamak üzereyim."
languages.original_text: "And it was by the Emperor's command that I took Adalbert's place through deception, pretending to be him. The dead man had inherited much influence and many thrones from his clan, which hastened my successful rise through the ranks. But it was not for wealth and power that I did this! I accepted the burden of hard work to empower the common people, to pave the way for liberation from oppression and injustice. And my part is almost done."
